lines.text: [Yosemite Sam takes the gold he had stolen from Louie to the Next To Last Chance Saloon to cash in]

[placing the gold on the counter]
Here, Pierre, weigh this up.

[placing the gold on the scale]
Yes, sir.
And keep your thumb off o' them scales...
[he levels his guns at Pierre]
... or I'll *blow* it off!
She's pretty small. Ten dollars.

[shocked]
*Ten dollars*? Why, it's gettin' so a man can't earn a dishonest livin' no more!

[as Sam digs for gold]
Maybe I should help. After all, we're partners.

[stops digging]
*Partners*? Our partnership has dissolved. This is all mine! Now beat it!
[Throws rocks at Bugs]
Well, of all the double-crossing...
[Sees that Sam is close to making a hole through the cliff]
Gee, I couldn't do that to the little guy. Hey, Sam!
*SHUT UP*!
[Continues digging, until he makes a hole and falls into the abyss below. All the while, Bugs just munches on a carrot]

[to Louie the prospector]
Okay, Louie, drop the pan!
[he levels his guns at him]
Chillicothe Sam!
Yeah, Chillicothe Sam, the roughest, toughest, rootinest, shootinest claim-jumper that ever jumped a claim, and I'm-a takin' over *your* claim! So get-a goin' a-fore I puncture your hide!
[he fires his guns at Louie repeatedly, and Louie jumps up and runs away]

[laughing]
He jumped around like a toady frog.
[he grabs the gold, disgusted; there's not that much gold there]
Hmm, pickin's is mighty slim around here. Hardly no reward for a day's work.
